    • Constructor Detail

      • Matrix

        public Matrix()
        Default constructor sets values to 0. The matrix itself is null as dimension is undetermined.

              int rCount,
              int cCount)
        Construct a Matrix with a float array
        Parameters:
        mat - The float array containing matrix entries
        rCount - The row count of the array
        cCount - The column count of the array

        Parameters:
        rCount - Matrix row count
        cCount - Matrix column count

        Copy constructor
        Parameters:
        m - Target matrix to perform a deep copy of

      • set

        public boolean set(float[] mat,
                   int rCount,
                   int cCount)
        Set this matrix using a float array
        Parameters:
        mat - The float array containing matrix entries
        rCount - Matrix row count
        cCount - Matrix column count
        Returns:
        true if it succeeded, false if incompatible matrix dimension

                      int col,

        col - The element's column
        val - The value to set the element by

                       int j)
        Get a particular element within the matrix
        Parameters:
        i - The element's row
        j - The element's column
        Returns:
        The value of the element at (i, j) 0 if out of bound 0 if matrix was not yet initialized

        public final Matrix transpose()
        Transpose the matrix by flipping all elements along the diagonal.
        Returns:
        A reference to this matrix

      • add

        public final Matrix add(Matrix m)
        Add the elements of another matrix to this matrix
        Parameters:
        m - A target matrix to add to this matrix
        Returns:
        A reference of this matrix No change occurs if the supplied matrix has a dimension mismatch

      • subtract

        public final Matrix subtract(Matrix m)
        Subtract the elements on another matrix from this matrix
        Parameters:
        m - A target matrix to negate from this matrix
        Returns:
        A reference of this matrix No change occurs if the supplied matrix has a dimension mismatch

      • scale

        public final Matrix scale(float value)
        Scale this matrix my multiplying each of its elements by a given value
        Parameters:
        value - The value to scale this matrix by
        Returns:
        A reference to this matrix

      • multiply

        public final Matrix multiply(Matrix m)
        Multiply a target matrix with this matrix
        Parameters:
        m - The target matrix
        Returns:
        The product of both matrices (can be different in dimension)

      • power

        public final Matrix power(int exponent)
        The power of this matrix is the product of the multiplication of this matrix N times. The matrix must be square for this to work, otherwise, nothing will be done.
        Parameters:
        exponent - The amount of times to multiply this matrix by. Must be a positive integer or else no change is done.
        Returns:
        A reference to this matrix.

      • solve

        public final Matrix solve()
        Solve this matrix using Gaussian Elimination. This can be used to solve for linear equations. An extra column can be added for the result. Once solved, this matrix should become an identity matrix, otherwise, if it is not an identity matrix, it is not possible to fully reduce this set of linear equations.
        Returns:
        A reference to this matrix.

      • inverse

        public final Matrix inverse()
        Compute the inverse of this matrix using Gaussian Elimination, but with an augmented matrix alongside it starting off as an identity matrix. This can be used to solve for vectors with a matrix multiplication. The benefits are improved efficiency.
        Returns:
        A reference to this matrix. If the matrix was unable to be fully reduced (e.g. was unable to reduce matrix into an identity matrix), the original matrix is reverted and no change occurs.

      • canMultiply

        public final boolean canMultiply(Matrix m)
        Verify if this matrix is able to be multiplied with a target matrix.
        Parameters:
        m - The target matrix
        Returns:
        true if compatible for multiplication false if incompatible for multiplication

      • isZeroMatrix

        public final boolean isZeroMatrix()
        Verify if this matrix is a zero matrix.
        Returns:
        true if all elements are zero. false if a single element is not zero.

      • isSquareMatrix

        public final boolean isSquareMatrix()
        Verify if this is a square matrix
        Returns:
        true if the width of this matrix equals the height of this matrix, false otherwise.

      • isLowerTriangleMatrix

        public final boolean isLowerTriangleMatrix()
        Verify if this matrix is a lower triangle matrix. Top-right entries are zero, excluding diagonal.
        Returns:
        true if it is a lower triangle matrix.

      • isUpperTriangleMatrix

        public final boolean isUpperTriangleMatrix()
        Verify if this matrix is an upper triangle matrix. Bottom-left entries are zero, excluding diagonal.
        Returns:
        true if it is an upper triangle matrix.

      • isSymmetricMatrix

        public final boolean isSymmetricMatrix()
        Verify if this matrix is symmetric along the diagonal.
        Returns:
        true if the matrix is symmetric along the diagonal.

      • isDiagonalMatrix

        public final boolean isDiagonalMatrix()
        Verify if this matrix is diagonal. This happens when the matrix is a zero matrix, with the exception of the diagonal.
        Returns:
        true if this is a diagonal matrix, false if this is a zero matrix false otherwise

      • isIdentityMatrix

        public final boolean isIdentityMatrix()
        Verify if this is an identity matrix where all of its elements are zero but the diagonal which are set to 1.
        Returns:
        true if this is an identity matrix.

      • isRowVector

        public final boolean isRowVector()
        Verify if this matrix is a row vector (nx1)
        Returns:
        true if this matrix dimension is (nx1)

      • isColumnVector

        public final boolean isColumnVector()
        Verify if this matrix is a row vector (1xn)
        Returns:
        true if this matrix dimension is (1xn)
